Package peregrine.task

Task framework for map/reduce/merge.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
JobDelegate Represents a basic Map/Merge/Reduce code backend provided by a developer for running their job.
Task Task interface.
WorkReference<T> Represents a unit of work to execute.
 

Class Summary
BackgroundTaskReporter Background runnable or reporting task progress via Reporter.
BaseJobDelegate  
BaseMapperTask Base task for all task that read input from external systems or the filesystem (or pipes).
BaseTask Generic code shared across all tasks.
MapperTask Handles executing map jobs.
MergerTask Handles invoking merges, reading the data off disk, etc.
PartitionWorkReference Represents a split on a partition.
ReducerTask Task and actual code used for running a reduce on shuffled data.
Report A Report allows a job to report progress to the controller for tracking and auditing purposes.
Scheduler Handles work scheduling in the cluster.
Work Represents work to the peregrine IO system.
 

Enum Summary
TaskStatus  
 

Package peregrine.task Description

Task framework for map/reduce/merge.
